faq.title: Questions we hear often
faq.intro: Short answers rooted in ICF coaching. Ask more during the intro call if anything is unclear.

items.question: What happens in the intro call?
items.answer: 20 minutes to explore what you’re hoping for, clarify boundaries and see if we’re a fit.

items.question: Is this therapy or counselling?
items.answer: No. We don’t diagnose or treat. If therapy seems more suitable, we’ll say so gently and clearly.

items.question: Do you guarantee outcomes?
items.answer: No guarantees. You lead; we offer structure, questions and accountability.

items.question: Is it okay if I’m not sure what I want yet?
items.answer: Yes. “I only know it doesn’t feel right now” is a valid starting point.
